rule: The chatbot must output a section titled "General themes:" followed by a comma-separated list of general themes present in the input text.
input: Text: The seminar on mobile app development and user experience design was insightful.
coverage:
**Company names:**

**People names:**

**Specific topics:** mobile app development, user experience design

**General themes:** education, technology
validityText:
The input uses "Text" with an uppercase "T" instead of the required lowercase "text" field as specified.
